Detailed Description

Create a GMRFLib_ai_param_tp -object holding the default values.

Parameters:
[out] ai_par A pointer to a GMRFLib_ai_param_tp pointer. At output the GMRFLib_ai_param_tp -object contains the default values.
Description of elements in GMRFLib_ai_param_tp -object:

GMRFLib_ai_param_tp::strategy : The strategy used to compute approximations to the posterior marginals . One of GMRFLib_ai_strategy_tp.
Default value: GMRFLib_AI_STRATEGY_MEANCORRECTED_GAUSSIAN

GMRFLib_ai_param_tp::fast : Use the conditinal mean as an approximation to the conditional mode, and approximate the log of the denominator in the Laplace approximation by a linear term.
Default value: GMRFLib_TRUE

GMRFLib_ai_param_tp::linear_correction One of GMRFLib_ai_linear_correction_tp. Various ways to approximate the log of the denominator in the Laplace approximation by a linear term. If GMRFLib_ai_param_tp::fast, and the meancorrected or skewmeancorrected strategy is selected, then GMRFLib_ai_param_tp::linear_correction is GMRFLib_AI_LINEAR_CORRECTION_FAST, which computes the linear term exact.

GMRFLib_ai_param_tp::int_strategy : Use a grid strategy or a central composite design to integrate out the hyperparameters.
Default value: GMRFLib_AI_INT_STRATEGY_GRID

GMRFLib_ai_param_tp::f0 : Only used if int_strategy = GMRFLib_AI_INT_STRATEGY_CCD.
Parameter used in the CCD integration.
Default value: 1.1

GMRFLib_ai_param_tp::dz : Step length for the integration procedure.
Default value: 1

GMRFLib_ai_param_tp::adjust_weights : Adjust the weights in the integration procedure so that a Gaussian density is integrated with no error.
Default value: GMRFLib_TRUE

GMRFLib_ai_param_tp::diff_logdens : Only used if int_strategy = GMRFLib_AI_INT_STRATEGY_GRID.
Threshhold for accepting a configuration.
Default value: 2.5

GMRFLib_ai_param_tp::skip_configurations : Only used if int_strategy = GMRFLib_AI_INT_STRATEGY_GRID.
Skip fill-in configuration larger than a non-accepted one.
Default value: GMRFLib_TRUE

GMRFLib_ai_param_tp::gradient_forward_finite_difference : Use forward finite difference to compute the gradient.
Default value: GMRFLib_TRUE

GMRFLib_ai_param_tp::gradient_finite_difference_step_len : Step length to compute the gradient.
Default value: 1.0e-4

GMRFLib_ai_param_tp::hessian_forward_finite_difference : Use forward finite difference to compute the hessian at the mode.
Default value: GMRFLib_TRUE

GMRFLib_ai_param_tp::hessian_finite_difference_step_len : Step length to compute the hessian at the mode.
Default value: 1.0e-4

GMRFLib_ai_param_tp::hessian_force_diagonal : Force the hessian to be diagonal.
Default value: GMRFLib_FALSE
